utils.request_mapper.mapper module

The request mapper handles the direct bind of request data into DTO objects. The mapper is implemented with the generic T type to provide flexibility for future changes. The source of input data is decided by the content type of the request. Currenlty only application/json and application/x-www-form-urlencoded are supported.

utils.request_mapper.mapper.map_request(request, mapping_type: Type[T]) → T | list[T][source]
